CustomField.formula:
IF(AND(FlagImplantsOn__c="Y", Implants_Units_PYtd__c > 0,Implants_Units_Ytd__c <>0), ((Implants_Units_Ytd__c - Implants_Units_PYtd__c ) / Implants_Units_PYtd__c),
IF(AND(FlagImplantsOn__c="Y", Implants_Units_PYtd__c < 0, Implants_Units_Ytd__c <>0) , (((Implants_Units_Ytd__c - Implants_Units_PYtd__c ) / Implants_Units_PYtd__c) * -1),
IF(AND(FlagImplantsOn__c="Y", Implants_Units_PYtd__c = 0, Implants_Units_Ytd__c <>0) , (Implants_Units_Ytd__c/100),
IF(AND(FlagImplantsOn__c="Y", Implants_Units_PYtd__c > 0,Implants_Units_Ytd__c =0), ((Implants_Units_Ytd__c - Implants_Units_PYtd__c )/ Implants_Units_PYtd__c) ,
IF(AND(FlagImplantsOn__c="Y", Implants_Units_PYtd__c < 0,Implants_Units_Ytd__c =0), 0 ,
0)))))
CustomField.label: Implant Trending YTD vs PYTD
